name: Fairy Fashion Show Dress Up Gold
name_original: Fairy Fashion Show Dress Up Gold
description:
If your little girl is a fashionista who loves magic fairy princesses, this app is for you! You can create your own beautiful fairy princess with Fairy Fashion Show- a virtual paper doll app that lets you make and dress up a pretty fairy fit for a fairy tale! Select her skin tone, eye color, hair color, hair style and outfit to make this cute paper doll look just like you!

Have fun dressing up your fairy from a wardrobe full of pretty dresses, jeweled flower tiaras, try on a glitter gem necklace or a flower lei, bracelet, earring, ring (the jewelry sparkles!), purse and shoes to create the latest in forest fairy style. Pick out your fairy's wings, hairstyle, and customize her features.

You can give her a name, and she can even have an flying fairy pet- like a sweet little fairy kitten, a pixie puppy, or even a fairy hedgehog and a fairy fox. She can model her fairytale outfit in many different scenes like an wild flower garden with roses, a rainbow waterfall, a beautiful lake filled with lily pads, and more enchanted places!

Roll the dice to get a new fairy princess with a different, random outfit every time.

When you're done giving her a beauty makeover, you can save your fairy to your device's Photo Album. Show off your fashionista skills by creating endless outfits for your fairy dress up doll!


Features:
-Game is for girls ages three and older.
-Includes over 20 dresses with tons of accessories, 12 fairy pets and 9 different backgrounds.
-Beautiful graphics by children’s book artist Laura Tallardy.
-Available in 10 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Hindi and Russian
-Child-friendly!

Note for Parents
This app:
- Does not contain ads, popups or in-app purchases.
- Does not contain links to social networks.
- Does not use data collection tools.
- Does not require an internet connection to play.
Please see our privacy policy for more information.
